original_text: So Herodias was angry with John. She wanted to kill him. But she could not do that, 20 because Herod was afraid of John. Herod knew that John was a good man and a servant of God. So Herod kept John safe. Herod liked to listen to the things that John said. But he did not know what to think about those things.
korean_text: 헤로디아가 요한을 원수로 여겨 죽이고자 하였으되 하지 못한 것은

sentences.original_text: So Herodias was angry with John
But she could not do that
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그녀는 그렇게 할 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: because Herod was afraid of John
Herod knew that John was a good man
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯은 요한이 선한 사람이라는 것을 알았습니다

sentences.original_text: Herod liked to listen to the things that John said
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯은 요한이 말하는 것들을 듣는 것을 좋아했습니다

sentences.original_text: But he did not know what to think about those things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그것들에 대해 어떻게 생각해야 할지 몰랐습니다
